entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 19.
